about_the_game:
Key Features:
  • Innovative Match-3 Mechanics: Match tiles to generate ammunition for your squad. Each color powers a different squad member.
  • Diverse Squad Members: Command a unique squad with members such as the Soldier, Sniper, SWAT, and Demolition man. Each has their own color and abilities.
  • Skill Trees: After each wave, allocate skill points to upgrade your squad members' abilities and improve your chances of survival.
  • Waves of Zombies: Face increasingly challenging waves of zombies.
  • Many planned future updates: Expect new squad members, skills, and more content in future updates.


Gameplay:
In Match Kill Survive, every match you make counts. Each match-3 combination generates ammunition for a specific squad member based on the color of the tiles. Use these points wisely to fend off the zombie hordes. After surviving a wave, reward your squad members with skill points and customize their skill trees to enhance their abilities.


Coming up:
  • Steam achievements (DONE)
  • Steam high scores w/ friends (DONE)
  • Translations (DONE)
  • flexible squad composition (DONE)
  • difficulty levels (DONE)
  • more classes (WIP)
  • special blocks
  • special zombies
  • target prioritisation for your squad members
  • different game mode(s)
  • ... and more!

linux_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: Ubuntu 22
  • Processor: Core I5
  • Memory: 4 GB RAM
  • Graphics: 1G memory
  • Storage: 450 MB available space

name: Match Kill Survive

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • OS: 10
  • Processor: Core I5
  • Memory: 4 GB RAM
  • Graphics: 1G memory
  • Storage: 450 MB available space
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system

short_description: An intense blend of match-3 puzzle action and combat in Match Kill Survive. Your mission: survive relentless waves of zombies by matching tiles to generate ammunition for your squad. Each color you match powers up a specific squad member, allowing them to unleash devastating attacks on the undead.
supported_languages: English, Portuguese - Brazil, Dutch, Thai, Simplified Chinese
